description: Response on an upsert request that encountered one or more problems

instance.description: The Instance, the bibliographic part, of this Inventory record set as it was pushed to Inventory storage

holdingsRecords.description: Collection of holdings of the Instance, each holdings record with embedded items as it was pushed to Inventory storage

metrics.description: Reports the number of operations performed by record type, transaction type, and outcome

INSTANCE.description: Reports the number of operations performed on Instance records by transaction type and outcome

CREATED.description: Reports the number of Instance create operations by outcome

COMPLETED.description: Number of successfully completed Instance create operations (0 or 1)

FAILED.description: Number of failed Instance create operations (0 or 1)

SKIPPED.description: Number of Instance create operations that were skipped

PENDING.description: Number of Instance create operations not completed (should always be 0)

UPDATED.description: Reports the number of Instance update operations by outcome

COMPLETED.description: Number of successfully completed Instance update operations (0 or 1)

FAILED.description: Number of failed Instance update operations (0 or 1)

SKIPPED.description: Number of Instance update operations that were skipped

PENDING.description: Number of Instance update operations not completed (should always be 0)

DELETED.description: Reports the number of Instance delete operations by outcome

COMPLETED.description: Number of successfully completed Instance delete operations (0 or 1)

FAILED.description: Number of failed Instance delete operations (0 or 1)

SKIPPED.description: Number of Instance delete operations that were skipped

PENDING.description: Number of Instance delete operations not completed (should always be 0)

HOLDINGS_RECORD.description: Reports the number of operations performed on holdings records by transaction type and outcome

CREATED.description: Reports the number of HoldingsRecord create operations by outcome

COMPLETED.description: Number of successfully completed HoldingsRecord create operations

FAILED.description: Number of failed HoldingsRecord create operations

SKIPPED.description: Number of HoldingsRecord create operations that were skipped

PENDING.description: Number of HoldingsRecord create operations not completed (should always be 0)

UPDATED.description: Reports the number of HoldingsRecord update operations by outcome

COMPLETED.description: Number of successfully completed HoldingsRecord update operations

FAILED.description: Number of failed HoldingsRecord update operations

SKIPPED.description: Number of HoldingsRecord update operations that were skipped

PENDING.description: Number of HoldingsRecord update operations not completed (should always be 0)

DELETED.description: Reports the number of HoldingsRecord delete operations by outcome

COMPLETED.description: Number of successfully completed HoldingsRecord delete operations

FAILED.description: Number of failed HoldingsRecord delete operations

SKIPPED.description: Number of HoldingsRecord delete operations that were skipped

PENDING.description: Number of HoldingsRecord delete operations not completed (should always be 0)

ITEM.description: Reports the number of operations performed on Items by transaction type and outcome

CREATED.description: Reports the number of Item create operations by outcome

COMPLETED.description: Number of successfully completed Item create operations

FAILED.description: Number of failed Item create operations

SKIPPED.description: Number of Item create operations that were skipped

PENDING.description: Number of Item create operations not completed (should always be 0)

UPDATED.description: Reports the number of Item update operations by outcome

COMPLETED.description: Number of successfully completed Item update operations

FAILED.description: Number of failed Item update operations

SKIPPED.description: Number of Item update operations that were skipped

PENDING.description: Number of Item update operations not completed (should always be 0)

DELETED.description: Reports the number of Item delete operations by outcome

COMPLETED.description: Number of successfully completed Item delete operations

FAILED.description: Number of failed Item delete operations

SKIPPED.description: Number of Item delete operations that were skipped

PENDING.description: Number of Item delete operations not completed (should always be 0)

INSTANCE_RELATIONSHIP.description: Reports the number of operations performed for the Instance's parent-child relationships

CREATED.description: Reports the number of relationship create operations by outcome

COMPLETED.description: Number of successfully completed relationship create operations

FAILED.description: Number of failed relationship create operations

SKIPPED.description: Number of relationship create operations that were skipped

PENDING.description: Number of Item relationship operations not completed (should always be 0)

DELETED.description: Reports the number of relationship delete operations by outcome

COMPLETED.description: Number of successfully completed relationship delete operations

FAILED.description: Number of failed relationship delete operations

SKIPPED.description: Number of relationship delete operations that were skipped

PENDING.description: Number of relationship delete operations not completed (should always be 0)

INSTANCE_TITLE_SUCCESSION.description: Reports the number of operations performed for the Instance's parent-child relationships

CREATED.description: Reports the number of title succession create operations by outcome

COMPLETED.description: Number of successfully completed title succession create operations

FAILED.description: Number of failed title succession create operations

SKIPPED.description: Number of title succession create operations that were skipped

PENDING.description: Number of title succession create operations not completed (should always be 0)

DELETED.description: Reports the number of title succession delete operations by outcome

COMPLETED.description: Number of successfully completed title succession delete operations

FAILED.description: Number of failed title succession delete operations

SKIPPED.description: Number of title succession delete operations that were skipped

PENDING.description: Number of title succession delete operations not completed (should always be 0)

errors.description: List of problems encountered during an Inventory update or delete request

entityType.description: The record type for which a problem occurred

transaction.description: Type of REST operation for which the problem occurred

statusCode.description: The HTTP status code returned by Inventory storage

shortMessage.description: A short error message that might be used by the client to count similar error occurrences

message.description: Error message returned by Inventory storage

anyOf.description: Error text returned by Inventory storage
JSON object of one or more structured error messages returned by Inventory storage

entity.description: The JSON object that was pushed to Inventory storage when the problem occurred
